title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Sept. 17, 1921. Financial Report of Koraes School

div.bibl: Saloniki, Sept. 17, 1921. FINANCIAL REPORT OF KORAES SCHOOL

body.p: The expenses of the Greek-American School, Koraes, during 1920 were $4,422.79. The receipts were $5,560.25, leaving a balance of $1,137.46 in the treasury.
During the first six months of this year the receipts were $6,556.10, the expenses $3,461.20, and the balance was $3,094.90.
The School Board is worthy of praise for its hard work in making the school a success.
